textBox.richText: We invited researchers to develop ingenious attack plans and to deceive various biometric authentications systems of different modalities during the TABULA RASA Spoofing Challenge that took place at ICB 2013. The TABULA RASA Spoofing Challenge 2013 http://www.tabularasa-euproject.org/evaluations/tabula-rasa-spoofing-challenge-2013 The Spoofing Challenge was very successful with many visitors (including Prof Anil Jain and Prof Stan Z Li) and 9 participants that tried to deceived the biometric authentication systems.
